posts.post_title: 1912 T202 Evers Makes A Safe Slide (Tinker/Chance) SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Probably the most important prewar Cubs card right? SOLD delivered through pp. Selling it for what I paid for it. Thanks for looking! :)

Joe
